definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: The poem employs as its first lines a verse plagiarized from a billboard .
sentences.chinese: 这首诗开头的几行抄袭了一个广告牌上的一节诗。

sentences.english: Billboards would be ads, so they would probably be excluded.
sentences.chinese: 广告牌一般都是广告，它们可能会被排除在外。

sentences.english: The Shell-sign resistance movement grew strong and raucous.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌广告牌抵制运动愈演愈烈。

sentences.english: Has this ever worked  with billboards?
sentences.chinese: 广告牌，这种媒介有效吗？

sentences.english: In the past few years, some of these monuments have become billboards.
sentences.chinese: 过去的几年，一些旅游胜地俨然成为宣传的广告牌。

sentences.english: Many say it's turned the campus into a commercial billboard.
sentences.chinese: 许多人说，这一行为将校园变成了一个商业广告牌。

sentences.english: When at Ginza in Tokyo, as Chinese we must mention about that billboard of Haier.
sentences.chinese: 去东京银座，作为中国人必提到海尔的那块广告牌。

sentences.english: Giant Pie billboard used to promote McDonald's in New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的馅饼广告牌用来在新西兰为麦当劳促销。

sentences.english: Sometimes I sold my signs at a loss. I did not make money on my product.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我亏本卖出广告牌，在产品上没赚到钱。

sentences.english: I tell teams working on print ads to start by creating a billboard.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉平面广告的工作团队，从制作一个广告牌开始。

sentences.english: Tandia: Why don't you take out a billboard? That should get you noticed.
sentences.chinese: 你应该拿一块广告牌？那样你就会得到关注。

sentences.english: Their billboards line the walls of subway stations.
sentences.chinese: 它们的广告牌在地铁站排成一列。

sentences.english: The huge billboard is actually an example of visual pollution in the city.
sentences.chinese: 那个巨大的广告牌是城市的一大视觉污染。

sentences.english: Candler aggressively advertised Coca-Cola in newspapers and on billboards.
sentences.chinese: 坎德勒积极宣传可口可乐公司在报纸和广告牌。

sentences.english: I think it's a black sign with white lettering.
sentences.chinese: 我认为它是一个写着白字的黑色广告牌。

sentences.english: Follow this road until you come to an ad . post.
sentences.chinese: 顺着这条街一直走到广告牌处。
